name: La Casa de las Madres
description: Since 1976, La Casa de las Madres has been responding to calls for help from domestic violence victims, of all ages, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Through their 24-hour toll-free crisis & support hotlines, text line and drop-in center, La Casa gives survivors the tools they need to transform their lives. They seek to prevent future violence by educating the community and by redefining public perceptions about domestic violence. Languages offered include English & Spanish; others are available
